metadata.title: CVE-2019-17345 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen 4.8.x through 4.11.x allowing x86 PV guestOS users to cause a denial of service because mishandling of failed IOMMUoperations causes a bug check during the cleanup of a crashed guest.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
